categories.description: list of sense-disambiguated category names extracted from (a subset) of the Category links on the page
categories.title: Categories

glosses.description: list of gloss strings for the word sense (usually only one). This has been cleaned, and should be straightforward text with no tagging.
glosses.title: Glosses

tags.description: list of gloss strings for the word sense (usually only one). This has been cleaned, and should be straightforward text with no tagging.
tags.title: Tags

description: WordEntry is a dictionary containing lexical information of a single word extracted from Wiktionary with wiktextract.

categories.description: list of non-disambiguated categories for the word
categories.title: Categories

lang_name.description: Localized language name of the word
lang_name.title: Lang Name

title: Spanish Wiktionary
